narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Jackson Nsilulu is a Counselor provider based in Trotwood, OH. From 2018-01 through 2019-09, this provider received $389K in Medicaid payments across 5K claims serving 742 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 100% of billing is concentrated in 90837 (90837), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2019-09, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
